pages.text: The marvelous $(item)Soul Beacon$() will, when given a sufficient $(item)soul shard$(), project effects tied to the type of entity whose soul is stored, to creatures around it. Similarly to a normal beacon it must sit atop a pyramid of $(item)soul steel blocks$().
The Soul Beacon is obtained by $(thing)engulfing$() a regular beacon, in the focusing structure displayed on the next page.

pages.title: Runes
pages.text: The beacon can be augmented with $(item)runes$(), by placing them in block form, in the eight blocks beneath in place of the soul steel. I have written on how to craft runes in a separate entry. Following is their use.
The Beastia rune allows the beacon to apply its effects to passive and neutral creatures within its range.
